creationTitle.description: Creative title for this unique menu item creation. Use plain string, no quotes or emojis

creationDescription.description: Detailed description of the customized menu item creation

reasons.description: List of reasons why this menu item is a good choice for the user

originalNutrition.description: Nutritional information for the menu item. Make sure it is accurate

appliedCustomizations.description: List of customizations applied to this menu item

redoModifiers.description: List of modifiers for re-generating the menu item (e.g. More Protein, Less Sugar) based on dietary goals

Reason.description: Description about why this menu customization is a good choice for the user

title.description: Title of the reason (start with a relevant emoji)

description.description: Explanation about how this customization helps the user reach their dietary goals

ingredient.description: Name of the ingredient (e.g. Cheese, Turkey, Mushroom). Starts with a relevant emoji if possible

reason.description: Short description of why this customization is a good choice for the user's dietary goals and how it may be used to enhance the menu item

substituted.description: Optional. If type is 'Substitute', this is the name of the ingredient being removed and replaced with [ingredient]

nutritionDifference.description: Nutritional information difference caused by this individual customization. Removals should be negative values, Additions should be positive values, Substitutions should be the difference between the two ingredients
